title: Create database configuration module
description: Create ModuleFolders/Infrastructure/Database/pgsql.py with proper PostgreSQL connection setup using environment variables. Include connection pooling and database initialization utilities.

title: Implement email service for notifications
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Email/email_service.py with email sending capabilities for verification and password reset. Support SMTP and Resend API.

title: Implement password reset flow
description: Add forgot-password and reset-password endpoints to AuthManager. Create email templates and token verification logic. Update web_server.py with /api/v1/auth/forgot-password and /api/v1/auth/reset-password endpoints.

title: Implement email verification flow
description: Add email verification token generation and verification to AuthManager. Create /api/v1/auth/verify-email endpoint. Add verification status checks to login.

title: Create OAuth manager for third-party login
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Auth/oauth_manager.py with GitHub and Google OAuth integration. Implement OAuth flow handlers and user account linking.

title: Create User service for profile management
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/User/ with UserManager.py, UserProfile.py, UserRepository.py. Add user CRUD operations and profile update endpoints.

title: Build Billing service structure
description: Create ModuleFolders/Service/Billing/ folder structure with subscription_models.py, SubscriptionManager.py, UsageTracker.py, PaymentProcessor.py base classes.

title: Implement Stripe payment integration
description: Add stripe integration to Billing service. Implement subscription creation, plan management, and webhook handling. Requires stripe python library.

title: Implement usage tracking system
description: Create UsageTracker to track character counts, API calls, storage usage. Add usage endpoints /api/v1/usage/current and /api/v1/usage/history.

title: Implement quota enforcement middleware
description: Create QuotaEnforcer to check user quotas before processing requests. Add middleware to web_server.py for quota validation on translation endpoints.

title: 实现用户管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加用户管理相关的 API 路由：GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/users/me, GET /api/v1/users (管理员), GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/users/{id} (管理员)

title: 实现订阅管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加订阅管理相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/subscriptions/plans, POST /api/v1/subscriptions, GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/subscriptions/current, GET /api/v1/subscriptions/invoices

title: 实现用量管理 API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加用量管理相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/usage/current, GET /api/v1/usage/history, GET /api/v1/usage/daily

title: 实现 OAuth API 路由
description: 在 web_server.py 中添加 OAuth 相关的 API 路由：GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/{provider}, GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/callback, GET /api/v1/auth/oauth/accounts, DELETE /api/v1/auth/oauth/accounts/{provider}

title: 更新 changelog1.md 进度
description: 完成 API 路由实现后，更新 changelog1.md 中的进度百分比和详细实现记录

title: 实现团队管理基础功能
description: 创建 TeamManager 服务,实现团队创建、成员邀请、角色分配等功能。依赖 User 和 Tenant 模型。

title: 实现团队管理API路由
description: 在Tools/WebServer/web_server.py中实现团队管理API路由系统,包括:1)团队CRUD操作(创建/查询/更新/删除) 2)成员管理(邀请/接受/拒绝/更新角色/移除) 3)权限验证。参考TeamManager和TeamRepository实现,符合PROMPT.md中的团队管理设计。

title: 实现团队邀请邮件发送功能
description: 在EmailService中添加团队邀请邮件模板和发送方法。当用户邀请成员时，自动发送包含邀请令牌的邮件。邮件应包含团队名称、邀请人信息和接受邀请的链接。

title: 实现团队成员配额检查中间件
description: 创建FastAPI中间件来检查团队成员数是否超过订阅计划限制。在添加成员前验证配额，超额时返回友好的错误信息并引导用户升级订阅。

title: 实现前端团队管理界面
description: 使用React + TypeScript实现团队管理前端页面，包括：团队列表、创建团队、查看团队详情、邀请成员、成员列表、角色管理。使用已有的API路由。

title: Analyze codebase architecture and deployment requirements
description: Examine project structure, identify services (FastAPI backend, React frontend, database), dependencies, environment variables, startup process, and data persistence needs. Create detailed analysis report.

title: Create Docker Compose configuration
description: Create docker-compose.yml with services: app (TranslateFlow), PostgreSQL, Redis (if needed). Include volume mounts, environment variables, network configuration, health checks, and dependency management.

title: Create production Dockerfile with optimizations
description: Optimize existing Dockerfile for production: multi-stage build, caching strategies, security scanning, minimal image size, proper health checks, and non-root user setup.

title: Create Dokploy deployment configuration
description: Create Dokploy-specific configuration: docker-compose.dokploy.yml, environment templates, deployment scripts, and documentation for Dokploy PaaS platform.

title: Create Vercel/serverless deployment configuration
description: Create vercel.json or equivalent for serverless deployment: API routes configuration, static file serving, environment variable templates, and build optimization.

title: Create deployment automation scripts
description: Create deployment scripts: deploy.sh (Docker), deploy-vercel.sh, environment setup script (.env.example), health check script, and database migration script.

title: Create comprehensive deployment documentation
description: Write planx.md with: deployment overview, architecture diagram, step-by-step guides for each platform (Docker Compose, Dokploy, Vercel), troubleshooting guide, CI/CD integration, and security best practices.

title: Fix docker-compose.yml to use Dockerfile.production
description: Update docker-compose.yml to reference Dockerfile.production instead of Dockerfile for consistency with production build

title: Build multi-platform Docker image
description: Build Docker image supporting linux/amd64 and linux/arm64 platforms using buildx

title: Start services with docker-compose
description: Start TranslateFlow and PostgreSQL services using docker-compose up

title: Verify services are running correctly
description: Check health endpoints and verify both app and postgres containers are healthy

title: Stop failed Docker build and pre-pull base images
description: Stop the failed buildx_buildkit_translateflow-builder0 container, then pre-pull python:3.12-slim and node:20-alpine base images to local cache to avoid Docker Hub timeout issues during build

title: Retry Docker build for ARM64 single-platform
description: Retry the Docker build using Dockerfile.production for linux/arm64 only (single platform). Use pre-pulled base images from previous task. Build translateflow:latest and translateflow:V2.4.5B tags

title: Optimize Dockerfile for slow network environments
description: Analyze Dockerfile.production and reduce system dependencies. Remove non-essential graphics libraries (libgl1, libglib2.0-0, etc.) if not needed for TranslateFlow. Consider using minimal Python base image or pre-built image with dependencies. Goal: Reduce apt-get packages from 73 to <20 for faster builds on slow networks.

title: Test optimized Docker build with reduced dependencies
description: Build translateflow:latest and translateflow:V2.4.5B images using optimized Dockerfile.production with minimal dependencies (~30 packages instead of 73). Verify build completes successfully and image works correctly. Expected build time: ~30-60 minutes on slow network.

title: Create GitHub Actions workflow for multi-platform Docker build
description: Create .github/workflows/docker-build.yml workflow to build ARM64/AMD64 images and push to GHCR. This solves Debian mirror network issues by using CI/CD with excellent connectivity.

title: Trigger GitHub Actions workflow to build multi-platform Docker images
description: Use gh cli or manually trigger Docker workflow to build ARM64/AMD64 images and push to GHCR

title: Test docker-compose.production.yml with GHCR images
description: After GitHub Actions workflow completes, login to GHCR and test docker-compose.production.yml with IMAGE_TAG variable

title: Research Python+Web desktop app frameworks
description: Analyze and compare frameworks like Tauri, Electron, PyWebView for building a Python+Web desktop application

title: Create bilingual file viewer component
description: Build a dedicated component to display bilingual output files (_bilingual.txt) with side-by-side source/translation layout, synchronized scrolling, and segment highlighting. Reference: Microsoft Translator's bilingual viewer patterns.

title: Add file comparison dashboard
description: Create a dashboard page showing original, translated, and bilingual files side-by-side. Include progress metrics, completion percentages, and export options. Reference: Crowdin/Transifex dashboard patterns.

title: Enhance editor with glossary panel
description: Add a glossary/terminology sidebar to the Editor page. Display relevant terms for current segment, allow adding/editing terms, and highlight glossary matches in the source text. Reference: Phrase/Memsource terminology features.

title: Add batch operations to editor
description: Implement multi-select functionality in Editor with batch translate, approve, and export actions. Add keyboard shortcuts for bulk operations. Improve efficiency for managing multiple segments.

title: Implement version history with diff viewer
description: Add version tracking for translations with visual diff viewer. Show change history, allow comparing versions, and provide rollback functionality. Reference: Git-style diff patterns adapted for bilingual content.

title: Add context preview panel to editor
description: Implement a context preview panel showing surrounding segments for better translation context. Display previous/next sentences with visual highlighting. Reference: Crowdin context preview features.

title: Create enhanced progress dashboard
description: Build a visual dashboard showing translation progress with charts, word counts, completion percentages, and quality metrics. Include exportable reports. Reference: Transifex reporting dashboard patterns.

title: Fix bilingual output config default in manual_export
description: Fix config.get('enable_bilingual_output', False) to use True as default in TaskExecutor.py line 359

title: Add re-translation support with force option
description: Add --force or --retranslate CLI option to allow re-translating already translated content. Modify CacheManager to include translated items when force is enabled.

description: Add enable_bilingual_output toggle to the Settings page in 功能开关 tab
